secureScript.script: String major_min=BUILD_VERSION.substring(0,BUILD_VERSION.indexOf(".",3)) return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"${major_min}\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">"

secureFallbackScript.script: String major_min=BUILD_VERSION.substring(0,BUILD_VERSION.indexOf(".",3)) return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"${major_min}\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">"

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
::@echo off echo %NETWORKPATH% "%BuildPass%" "klasj\%BuildUser%" net use %NETWORKPATH%\ipc$ "%BuildPass%" /user:"klasj\%BuildUser%" if not exist %NETWORKPATH%\SW-OMD\Archer_Installations\NuArcher_V%MajorMinor_Ver%\%BUILDTYPE%\Archer_Installation_%BUILD_VERSION% ( echo isntallation package doesn't exist on network goto error ) echo ****clean KT logs start***** forfiles /p "D:\Logs" /s /d -7 /c "cmd /c del /q /f @file"
echo ****clean KT logs end*****
echo begin copy Archer installation robocopy /MT:128 /r:2 %NETWORKPATH%\SW-OMD\Archer_Installations\NuArcher_V%MajorMinor_Ver%\%BUILDTYPE%\Archer_Installation_%BUILD_VERSION% C:\temp\Archer_Installation_%BUILD_VERSION% /s if NOT %errorlevel% LEQ 7 ( echo copy installer to local failed goto error ) echo copy end
echo ****************Copy MPI manager from installation folder to C:\5300\Bin***** xcopy "C:\temp\Archer_Installation_%BUILD_VERSION%\MPIManager\MPIManager.exe" C:\5300\Bin\ /f /r /s /y if not %errorlevel% equ 0 ( echo ***************Copy MIPmanager failed failed*************** goto error )
echo ########################################## NUNIT preperation: Start ################################################################ echo ***************Copy Nunit scripts ****** If Exist C:\5300\Bin_Common\FileVer.bat call C:\5300\Bin_Common\FileVer.bat If exist C:\Temp\VerInfo.txt find /i "Release Configuration" C:\Temp\VerInfo.txt if %errorlevel% EQU 0 (set BuildMode=Release) else (set BuildMode=Debug)
robocopy /MT:128 /r:2 %NETWORKPATH%\SW-OMD\Archer_Builds\uArcher_Builds\uArcher_%MajorMinor_Ver%\%BUILDTYPE%\UOMD_%BUILD_VERSION%_%BuildMode%\NUnit C:\5300\NUnit /s if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% LEQ 7 goto error echo *********Creating NUnit links************* if not exist C:\5300\Nunit\Bin\Link2Bin mklink /d C:\5300\Nunit\Bin\Link2Bin C:\5300\Bin if not exist C:\5300\Nunit\Bin\Link2Bin goto error echo ########################################### NUNIT preperation:End ####################################################################
echo ****************Exporting software version from registry****** regedit.exe /e "C:\temp\CurrentVersion.reg" "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KLA-Tencor\OM\5300\Machine\Software Version" if not %errorlevel% equ 0 goto error
echo ****************Running ToolConfiguration for %ToolType%****** cd C:\temp\Archer_Installation_%BUILD_VERSION%\supportfiles\ToolConfig C:\temp\Archer_Installation_%BUILD_VERSION%\supportfiles\ToolConfig\ToolConfig.exe -I "%ToolType%" if not %errorlevel% equ 0 ( echo ***************Run ToolConfiguration failed*************** goto error )
REG ADD "HKLM\SOFTWARE\KLA-Tencor\OM\5300\Machine\Serial Number" /t REG_SZ /d L1357 /f if not %errorlevel% equ 0 goto error
regedit.exe /S "C:\temp\CurrentVersion.reg" if not %errorlevel% equ 0 goto error
echo ***************Inject Simulator license for %ToolType%****** del /q /f "C:\Program Files\KLA-Tencor\Component Suite\Bin\*.ktlic"
xcopy "D:\licenses\%ToolType%\*.*" "C:\Program Files\KLA-Tencor\Component Suite\Bin\" /f /r /s /y if not %errorlevel%==0 ( echo *********copy license file failed************* goto error ) C:\5300\Bin\McdbActivate.exe -licenses if not %errorlevel%==0 ( echo ***************active license file failed*********** goto error )
echo ****************** begin Archer installation***************** C:\temp\Archer_Installation_%BUILD_VERSION%\Setup.exe /CI_INSTALL set InstallExitCode=%errorlevel% if %InstallExitCode%==0 goto installsucceed if %InstallExitCode%==3010 goto installsucceed goto installerror :installsucceed echo **************** Archer installation finished successfully **********
echo Changing registry key for auto logon:HKLM\SOFTWARE\KLA-Tencor\OM\5300\Security\Automatic Logon REG ADD "HKLM\SOFTWARE\KLA-Tencor\OM\5300\Security\Automatic Logon" /t REG_SZ /d O1 /f if not %errorlevel% equ 0 goto error REG ADD "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon" /v AutoAdminLogon /t REG_SZ /d 1 /f if not %errorlevel% equ 0 goto error
shutdown -r -t 50 set shutdownerror=%errorlevel% if %shutdownerror%==1190 goto end if not %shutdownerror% equ 0 goto error goto end :installerror echo Archer installation failed to excute For /f "tokens=2-4 delims=/ " %%a in ('date /t') do (set mydate=%%c-%%a-%%b) set mydate=%mydate: =_% echo begin compress installation logs 7z a C:\temp\ArcherSetupLogs_%BUILD_VERSION%_%mydate%.zip C:\Temp\ArcherSetupLogs_%BUILD_VERSION%\ if not %errorlevel% equ 0 ( echo Compress installation logs failed, please go to %SimulatorEngine% for more information goto error ) echo begin copy Archer installation logs to D:\Archer_Installations\Logs echo clean logs older than 7 days forfiles /p "D:\Archer_Installations\Logs" /s /d -7 /c "cmd /c del /q /f @file" xcopy C:\temp\ArcherSetupLogs_%BUILD_VERSION%_%mydate%.zip D:\Archer_Installations\Logs\ /f /s if not %errorlevel% equ 0 ( echo copy Archer installation logs failed goto error ) echo copy end
:error exit /b 1 :end exit /b 0
